text:
Golden Village (GV) Gold Class at Suntec City offers a luxurious cinematic experience, combining premium comfort with world-class entertainment. Designed for moviegoers who appreciate the finer things, GV Gold Class elevates your night out with plush reclining seats, impeccable service, and gourmet dining options—all within an intimate, exclusive setting.

The theater features state-of-the-art audio-visual technology, ensuring crystal-clear visuals and immersive sound. Gold Class seats are spacious and adjustable, allowing you to relax in comfort while enjoying your film. Each seat is equipped with a personal call button for in-seat service, so you can order food and drinks without leaving your spot. The menu includes a selection of gourmet dishes, snacks, and beverages, including wine and cocktails, catering to every taste.

Conveniently located in Suntec City, GV Gold Class is ideal for date nights, special occasions, or simply treating yourself to a premium movie experience. The venue’s luxurious ambience, coupled with personalized service, ensures an unforgettable outing. Whether you’re watching the latest blockbuster or an indie gem, GV Gold Class transforms an ordinary movie into a first-class event, making it the perfect destination for entertainment in the heart of Singapore.

They sold us dining vouchers without an expiry date less than 6 months ago and now when we returned they said it’s no longer valid, I think that’s quite unethical. Apart from that disappointment we enjoyed our movie. Beef cheeks was yummy, service was efficient. We ordered our food when we waited at the lounge to be served in the theatre. Food was promptly served before the movie started. However they came to our seat for payment some time after the movie has started, which interrupted us. When we ordered they told us that payment is done after the movie so that was surprising.

Third time visit gold class Suntec, also third time eating gold class food, thanks for the 2 complimentary movie pass and the value for money lunch set 😍😍😍🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻 very good service provided by a Chinese short haired lady 😘😘😘

For the experience , the tickets are definitely pricey . Otherwise , seats are comfortable and service are good . Maybe management should also review  the French Fries & Popcorn Combo package which comes at $25/pax. For 2 pax, it’s $50 basically eating just fries and popcorn. More worthwhile ordering other food (eg chicken wings) packages though.

Usual weekend activities. Basic items included i.e. bottled water, cookie pack and a small thin blanket. Seats are comfortable but do check between the fold of the recliner footrest. There's once my leg got smeared with ketchup that was left by previous patron. The service staff help me clean up the seat.
